sentence: Lowe's Companies, Inc. ( LOW ) will begin trading ex-dividend on January 23, 2018.
A cash dividend payment of $0.41 per share is scheduled to be paid on February 07, 2018.
Shareholders who purchased LOW prior to the ex-dividend date are eligible for the cash dividend payment.
This marks the 3rd quarter that LOW has paid the same dividend.
The previous trading day's last sale of LOW was $104.95, representing a -0.62% decrease from the 52 week high of $105.60 and a 48.32% increase over the 52 week low of $70.76.
LOW is a part of the Consumer Services sector, which includes companies such as Home Depot, Inc. ( HD ) and Sherwin-Williams Company ( SHW ).
LOW's current earnings per share, an indicator of a company's profitability, is $4.17.
Zacks Investment Research reports LOW's forecasted earnings growth in 2018 as 13.26%, compared to an industry average of 6.6%.
For more information on the declaration, record and payment dates, visit the LOW Dividend History page.
Our Dividend Calendar has the full list of stocks that have an ex-dividend today.
